::KitKat3::

She followed them into the room and layed down in wolf mode next to 
Drillbit.  She listened in on the conversation.  She had diplomatic 
skills, but unless asked, she wouldn't interfere with Drillbit's 
leadership. Not yet anyway. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He wasn't sure how to do this. He had never done any diplomatic
> negotiations before.
> "Well, is are factions are to be allined, there will have to be 
terms.
> Do you want it to be a full alliance where are factions are 
obligated to
> help each other, a cease fire, or what? Also why do you need the
> alliance and why us?"
